communication

Interface TCP

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommunicationAdapter, ListController, OmniRepository, OmniServer, StateAdapter, WaitAnswer, WaitAuthentication, WaitRequest

    public interface TCP
    - Interface TCP - This interface has every TCP communication method prototype needed in a class that implements TCP operations. Of course every method is supposed to be used as the user wants. Commentaries simply describe what they are intended to do when overriding it. This way we maintain a concise code. Created by OmniBox on 01-11-2014.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Request getTCPMessage(java.net.Socket socket)
      Gets message via TCP socket.
      void sendTCPMessage(java.net.Socket socket, Request cmd)
      Sends message via TCP socket.

    • Method Detail

      • sendTCPMessage

        void sendTCPMessage(java.net.Socket socket,
                  Request cmd)
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Sends message via TCP socket. It's always sent a Request object.
        Parameters:
        socket - Destiny socket
        cmd - Request to send
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If operation is interrupted
        java.io.IOException - If there's an error associated with a socket operation

      • getTCPMessage

        Request getTCPMessage(java.net.Socket socket)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                             java.io.IOException,
                             java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Gets message via TCP socket. This blocks the socket. It's always expected to receive a Request object.
        Parameters:
        socket - Destiny socket
        Returns:
        received message
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If operation is interrupted
        java.io.IOException - If there's an error associated with a socket operation
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
